word: When warned against going unarmed amongst savage and hostile tribes, he declared himself provided with arms, \97\93prayer, zeal for Christ, and confidence in his help.\94 \93I am also,\94 he said, \93provided with the love of God and my neighbor in my heart, and the Bible is in my hand.\94 The Bible in Hebrew and English he carried with him wherever he went. Of one of his later journeys he says, \93I kept the Bible open in my hand. I felt my power was in the book, and that its might would sustain me.\94
